text: Maanɛɛʋɛ ga ti GALA goo wo nui naa ʋaa, ɓaa kulakɛlɛma ɠaa nui naa, mazɔlɔɔ kpɔɛʋɛ ga nuiti ti kololalai ɠɛ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI wa-ƓALAGI laalɔɠɔma, nii é wo ɠulani Ezipete yooi zu, é wo ɠula duɔla ʋɛlɛi wu, mazɔlɔɔ é ɠɛni pɔ ga é wo zeɠe pelei ʋa, nii Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI wa-ƓALAGI ma levei veeni ga wo ziɛ la. Wa faa ɲɔi lɔɔɠula ɠana ɓɔɠɔ zaama.
